data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 10,264 believers find a person of peace today among the 125,036 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Fuzhou that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Han Chinese, Shaozhou people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary:
the county of Fuzhou, Jiangxi, China has a population of 135,300.

We estimate Fuzhou has 10,264 people who might know Jesus, 2,186 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 122,850 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Fuzhou to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
